title: Gwak Kyung-keun
text:
Gwak Kyung-Keun (곽경근; born October 10, 1972) is a South Korean <a href="soccer">football</a> player who plays at the <a href="Striker%20%28association%20football%29">forward position</a>.
When he transferred to <a href="Busan%20IPark">Busan I'cons</a>, he changed his position to defender.
He is now the manager of <a href="Bucheon%20FC%201995">Bucheon FC 1995</a> in <a href="K%20League">K League</a>.
